        running - the value that controls whether the solver should continue/stop solving.

      • hint

        public boolean hint()
        Description copied from class: Solver
        Highlights a safe/recommended move to the user.
        Specified by:
        hint in class Solver
        Returns:
        True if a hint (one that has not already been hinted) is found. False if no hint or futher hints are found.

      • assist

        public boolean assist()
        Description copied from class: Solver
        Probe a safe/recommended cell.
        Specified by:
        assist in class Solver
        Returns:
        True if a cell is found and probed. False if no safe cell is found and probed.

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Description copied from class: Solver
        Probe all safe/recommended cells present on the board. Stop when no more safe/recommended moves can be found. Basically repeatably calls the assist method.
        Specified by:
        solve in class Solver

      • getBestMove

        private Cell getBestMove(java.util.Map<Cell,org.apache.commons.math3.fraction.BigFraction> probs)
        Returns the cell with the best move. If more than one cell has the lowest probabiltiy of being a mine then getBestStratCell is then used.
        Parameters:
        probs - a mapping of cells to their probabilties.
        Returns:
        the cell that would be the best move to make.

      • calcAllCellsProb

        private java.util.Map<Cell,org.apache.commons.math3.fraction.BigFraction> calcAllCellsProb()
        Calculates each cells probabiltiy of being a mine. Esentially iterates through all shore solutions, counting the occurances of each cell being a mine and divides this by the total number of solutions. Uses combinatorics to smallen the problem size by removing the need to include sea cells in the problem set.
        Returns:
        a mapping of cells to the probability value of being a mine.

      • displayProb

        public void displayProb()
        Display the probabiltiies of cells to the GUI.

      • getBestProbCells

        private java.util.List<Cell> getBestProbCells(java.util.Map<Cell,org.apache.commons.math3.fraction.BigFraction> probs)
        Fetch a list of the cells with the lowest probability or being a mine.
        Parameters:
        probs - a mapping of cells to their probabilitiy of being a mine.
        Returns:
        a list of the cell(s) with the lowst probabilitiy of being a mine.

      • getBestStratCells

        private java.util.List<Cell> getBestStratCells(java.util.List<Cell> bestProbCells,
                                               java.util.Map<Cell,org.apache.commons.math3.fraction.BigFraction> probs)
        Fetch the cells that have the best strategic value from a given list.
        Parameters:
        bestProbCells - list of cells that have the lowest probabilities
        probs - a mapping of cells to their probabilitiy of being a mine.
        Returns:
        a list of cells that have the best strategic value.

      • genBinaryConstraints

        private void genBinaryConstraints(org.sat4j.pb.IPBSolver pbSolver)
                           throws org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException
        Generates the binary constraints for the problem set.
        Parameters:
        pbSolver - the solver to add the constraints to.
        Throws:
        org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException - when a contraint is added that directly contradicts an already existing constraint.
